channel.title: Need help blocking illegal characters!: ~!@#$*%
channel.description: Ok I remember there use to be a thread on these forums in tutorials showing how to block illegal charcter names like ~@#!% It was called: Blocking illegal names the fun way.......If they used one of those symbols in there name then it crashed there client.....Can anyone help me please??????????
